speaker: President.
english: President. Since the next speaker is Polish, I should report that this morning I heard that the United Kingdom has 500 000 Polish workers now. They are doing a marvellous job.
original: President. Since the next speaker is Polish, I should report that this morning I heard that the United Kingdom has 500 000 Polish workers now. They are doing a marvellous job.
agenda_item: Mutual information procedure Integration of immigrants in the European Union European Union immigration policy (debate)
